name: automated
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
carried out by machines or computers without needing human control: a fully automated system Most lighthouses are now fully automated. See
automate
More examplesFewer examplesAutomated defibrillators can reverse sudden cardiac arrest if applied quickly. I receive a lot of sales calls placed through automated diallers.Automated check-in machines are common in airports.
